channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: T?karo Tribe
channel.desc: Learning te reo M?ori has never been easier. A, E, I, O, U, P?p? R?kau and K?k? make tikanga, te reo and waiata fun for everyone. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Darwin and Newts
channel.desc: An animated series for youngsters who love to figure out how things work. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Island of Mystery
channel.desc: After escaping the slimy, scale-covered ponaturi, Josh, Kazumi, Rangi, Kura, and Toro decide to search the creatures' village for the godstick. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Te N?tube
channel.desc: Two clever cousins, Atareta and Te Haakura, share their world with their followers. (R).

channel.desc: A fun sing-along M?ori performing arts series for children. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Oranga Ng?kau
channel.desc: Yvonne Te Wanihi Edwards presents uniquely M?ori exercise workouts for young and old to keep fit and healthy. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Wh?nau Bake-Off
channel.desc: A baking show that pits wh?nau against each other in a battle for bragging rights. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: The Hui
channel.desc: A compelling mix of current affairs investigations, human interest and arts and culture stories. Made with the support of Te M?ngai P?ho and NZ on Air. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Home, Land & Sea
channel.desc: A ten part factual series that exmines the innovative ways in which M?ori are changing the game when it comes to sustainability, restoration and land and sea use. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Te Ao with Moana
channel.desc: Current affairs series that puts a M?ori lens on issues that distinguishes it from other current affairs programmes. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Homesteads
channel.desc: People came from all over ?tiria to help build the Piritaha Homestead, a humble farmhouse built in the 1900s using kauri milled from their own whenua. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Mountain
channel.desc: Narrated by Willem Dafoe and through astonishing images and a beautiful cinematography, the film explores the high peaks and mountains around the world.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: T?ku Reo
channel.desc: Professor John Moorfield's M?ori language course supported by an interactive website. (R).

channel.title: ?paki
channel.desc: P?nia Papa uses games, music and activities to teach M?ori. (R).

channel.title: Ako
channel.desc: P?nia Papa presents M?ori language lessons for intermediate-level learners. (R).

channel.title: Takaro Tribe

channel.title: Marae
channel.desc: Your way into the M?ori world. M?iatanga, Whanaungatanga, Manaakitanga - We bring you stories with heart.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Moon Tide Fishing Grass Roots
channel.desc: Nore heads to Aotea to fish its bountiful waters in the auspicious Tangaroa Kiokio maramataka phase with his cuzzie Jeff Cleave. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Tui Teka's Trail
channel.desc: Tui helps a young farrier out with Max the stallion who front foots and double barrel kicks. Up the East Coast, Tui shares some tips and tricks.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Tales From Zambia
channel.desc: Explore Zambia's diverse wildlife, from majestic elephants to playful baboons, through this captivating collection. Venture into breathtaking habitats and witness fascinating animal behaviours.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Hunt With Me
channel.desc: Ng?ti Hine FM DJ Amber Smith and her father head out in search of monster kingfish, while Gavin is deep in the Ruahine Ranges determined to fill the freezer with venison. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Haututu Hunters
channel.desc: Four city slickers get out of their comfort zones and connect with their whenua and wh?nau. The boys travel to Samoa to try heal the past and give pig hunting with a Samoan twist a go. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Piri's Tiki Tour
channel.desc: All Black hero Piri Weepu combines his love for Rugby with his skill at diving and hunting around Aotearoa meeting up with locals. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Up 2
channel.desc: Hosts Piri Weepu and Matua Parkinson travel around Aotearoa to see what some of our sporting heroes have been up to. Mutts catches up with NZ M?ori legend Shannon Paku. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Whakaata M?ori
channel.desc: Whakaata M?ori specialises in the stories of Aotearoa. Be entertained and informed with news, current affairs, sports, drama, documentaries and much more.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Te Pou-o-Mangataawhiri
channel.desc: NEW: Featuring Te Pou-o-Mangatawhiri, Whakaata M?ori presents Te Matatini o Te K?hui Maunga - the ultimate celebration of haka excellence. This is haka at its finest.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Autaia Haka Theatre
channel.desc: NEW: Hoani Waititi takes the stage with a powerful message about tino rangatiratanga. Heavy in movement and rich in mana, they stand for M?ori independence and cultural strength.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Autaia Haka Theatre
channel.desc: NEW: A powerhouse of performance - Hoani Waititi fuses traditional haka with intense movement to reaffirm mana motuhake and resistance through kapa haka.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Ata Toi + Wai
channel.desc: Join the dynamic trio Chey Milne, Tawaroa Kawana and Kaaterama Pou as they celebrate music through a distinctly M?ori lens. Kaaterama shares her soulful influences and her m?t?pono. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: M? Te Atea
channel.desc: Tatai Henare explains to us the simplicity involved in his composition and his philosophies on storytelling. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Amplify
channel.desc: Inuk sensation Beatrice Deer takes a deep dive into the history of Inuit residential schools to craft an arresting new song in tribute to the lost children in unmarked graves. Directed by asinnajaq.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Escape from Mogadishu
channel.desc: In war-torn Somalia, the personnel and the families of both the South Korean and the North Korean Embassies have the same goal: Escape from Mogadishu. Rated M. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Fresh 2025
channel.desc: Our favourite flavours of the Pacific are presented in a Fresh Poly-platter in this series dedicated to inspiring Islanders worldwide. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: The Ring Inz
channel.desc: Mavis has a solution for Fanny's depressed state but Moke wants none of it.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Rage Against The Rangatahi 2
channel.desc: Distractions & Secrets - What secrets are the Ragers hiding from their parents? (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Only In Aotearoa
channel.desc: Short and sharp comedy skits from a M?ori perspective. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: The Walkers
channel.desc: PREMIERE: In this season we follow Stan and Lou as they take on all that comes with married life, while April and Ross prepare for their big move back to Aotearoa.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Under The Wh?riki
channel.desc: NEW: A video podcast confronting kaupapa often silenced or hidden within te ao M?ori. This series lifts the metaphorical wh?riki to expose and explore issues we often shy away from.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Ahik?roa
channel.desc: Sorrow and heartbreak brings everyone together during the hardest time at Te P?. Tipene looks to his brother for guidance. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Breaking Silence
channel.desc: For many violence is handed from generation to generation. Wiremu, with the love and support of his parents, has broken this cycle of abuse. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Breaking Silence
channel.desc: People who are part of the Rainbow community are more than twice as likely to experience partner violence than their straight counterparts. Sandra shares her own story. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: K Rd Chronicles
channel.desc: A look at homelessness from the inside. Six, once homeless herself, now a journalist, is our guide to the diverse, harsh and often tragic world of the people living on and around Karangahape Road. (R).
